p: Non-human primates carcasses from nine municipalities ( S1C Fig) were received during YF epizootics from January to February 2017, in MG state. Among the carcasses there were individuals from genera Alouatta, Callithrix and Callicebus ( S1 Table). The NHP carcasses were collected in different rural areas of MG, where epizootics were reported in 2017 and 2018, and sent to our laboratory. Liver fragments were collected under biosafety conditions and kept at -70Â°C until RNA extraction.
